allow: Bash(for file in mellanoxSimulator.ts bcmSimulator.ts infinibandSimulator.ts ipmitoolSimulator.ts)

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: NVIDIA DGX Datacenter Simulator

A comprehensive training tool for NVIDIA DCA certification preparation,
featuring interactive labs, command simulation, and scenario-based learning.

Features:
- Simulated terminal with nvidia-smi, dcgmi, slurm, and other DGX tools
- Interactive lab scenarios across all 5 DCA exam domains
- Real-time GPU metrics visualization
- Fault injection for troubleshooting practice
- Exam preparation mode with practice questions

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Reorganize project structure: clean up root directory

- Delete historical/session files \(SESSION_SUMMARY.md, DOMAIN5_XID79_FIX.md\)
- Delete redundant files \(PROJECT_SUMMARY.md - covered by README\)
- Merge TODO.md + ROADMAP.md into docs/ROADMAP.md
- Move documentation to organized structure:
  - docs/USAGE.md \(user guide\)
  - docs/development/implementation-plan.md
  - docs/reference/command-specification.md
  - docs/testing/scenario-checklist.md
- Add test-results.txt to .gitignore
- Root now contains only README.md for cleaner structure

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
